insert into blueprint_formula (blueprint_id, material_type_id, type_name, activity_id, quantity) values
(#{item.blueprintId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.materialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.activityId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into blueprint_formula (blueprint_id, material_type_id, type_name, activity_id, quantity) values (#{blueprintId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}) on duplicate key update blueprint_id = #{blueprintId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, material_type_id = #{materialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}

insert into blueprint_formula
blueprint_id,
material_type_id,
type_name,
activity_id,
quantity,
values
#{blueprintId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{materialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{activityId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on duplicate key update
blueprint_id = #{blueprintId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
material_type_id = #{materialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
